title: Wizard boyfriend that comes  to cheer you up during a party but accidentally sets the room on fire when trying to light the fireplace with a spell ASMR from tiktok

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, accidentally set a house on fire, killing the owner and everyone that visits them, oops. You can only accidentally set people's homes on fire three times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You don't damage yourself since you ran pretty quick.
- Everyone who dies in the house fires gets cleaned.
- You will know the roles of everyone you killed, cause you saw the party invite dm group.
